cz.ive.process
Class Say

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.process.CommonProcessTemplate
      cz.ive.process.Say
All Implemented Interfaces:
OntologyToken, ProcessTemplate, java.io.Serializable
public class Say
extends CommonProcessTemplate

Processtemplate for the simple Say goal, that sets up the "mouth" attribute of the actor to the sentence given as a parameter "sentence".

Author:
ondra

atomicStop

public ProcessResult atomicStop(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
Called to stop the running process. This may not be an instant. If the process is still running, than the atomicLength should be called to retrieve updated run time estimate.

Specified by:
atomicStop in interface ProcessTemplate
